name: Commonwealth ex rel. Blackman, Appellant, v. Banmiller
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Blackman v. Banmiller

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok, Eagen and Alpern, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Blackman, Appellant, v. Banmiller.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Musmanno,
The order of the court below is affirmed on Judge SLOANE's Second Opinion — April of 1961.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Musmanno,

attorneys: Robert Blackman, appellant, in propria persona.
William H. Wolf, Jr. and Arlen Specter, Assistant District Attorneys, Paul M. Chalfin, First Assistant District Attorney, and James G. GrumUsh, Jr., District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Blackman, Appellant, v. Banmiller.
Submitted November 16, 1961.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok, Eagen and Alpern, JJ.
Robert Blackman, appellant, in propria persona.
William H. Wolf, Jr. and Arlen Specter, Assistant District Attorneys, Paul M. Chalfin, First Assistant District Attorney, and James G. GrumUsh, Jr., District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
January 2, 1962:
